definitions: If you refer to a person or thing as the linchpin of something, you mean that they are the most important person or thing involved in it.
a pin placed transversely through an axle to keep a wheel in position
a person or thing regarded as an essential or coordinating element
a pin that goes through the end of an axle outside the wheel to keep the wheel from coming off
anything serving to hold together the parts of a whole
a pin inserted through the end of an axletree to keep the wheel on
something that holds the various elements of a complicated structure together
